channel.title: How to add your New Wepons to item.cfg
channel.description:
How do i add new items that i have on Class8 (client) in my item.cfg to add stats???
When i do that :
item = 8890 Rune_Whip A_Rune_Whip. 10000 10000 15000 0 232 0 0 0 and the rest...
it crash when i try to open server...
But when i just pickup the item on the server i can see the rune whip.
What do i need to do?

item.title: How to add your New Wepons to item.cfg
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Moved to server help.

Use TABs not spaces.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 29-08-2009, 21:20:33[/size][hr]Oh shat, just realised the date, locked.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add your New Wepons to item.cfg
